main event: On May 8, 1962, several witnesses reported seeing a bright, unidentified flying object in Burlington, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering and then rapidly accelerating, it was described as circular and approximately 30-60 feet in diameter, Multiple witnesses estimated it was at an altitude of around 3,000 feet, the sighting lasted for approximately 10 to 15 minutes, No sound was associated with the object during its appearance.
witness description: witnesses included a sales manager and a private pilot, among others.
